trans-unit.source: Checks filenames after uploading and replaces any forbidden special characters
By default all renamed files with be trimmed to 32 characters.
trans-unit.target: By default all renamed files with be trimmed to 32 characters.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select a custom character set for automatically renamed files.
Here you can define a specific locale for the automatically renamed files. For example, selecting German will convert 'รถ' to 'oe' instead of 'o'.
